xml.data:
Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 12 Kilesagocchaka » 12.7 Kilesakilesasampayuttaduka
12.7.1--7 Paṭiccādivāra
Kilesagocchaka
Kilesakilesasampayuttaduka
Paṭiccādivāra
97.
4051Kilesañceva kilesasampayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso ceva kilesasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—  lobhaṃ paṭicca moho diṭṭhi thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ. (Kilesasaṃkiliṭṭhadukasadisaṃ ninnānākaraṇaṃ, sabbe vārā.)
4052Kilesakilesasampayuttadukaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
<< 12.7 Kilesakilesasampayuttadukaup12.8 Kilesavippayuttasaṃkilesikaduka >>
